casebody.data:
DUNN, et al.
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 605PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2007. John R. Wylie, David J. Guin, Birmingham, AL, Tammy Stokes, Stephen Dampier, Norman Smith, Greensboro, Jack E. Thornton, Jr., Winston Salem, Arthur T. Susman, for Dunn, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of June 2007 *901by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2007."
